free.chess
Interface BoardPainter

All Known Subinterfaces:
ColoredBoardPainter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBoardPainter, ImageBoardPainter, PlainBoardPainter
public interface BoardPainter

An interface for classes who paint the board image on the Board component to implement.

Method Summary
 java.awt.Dimension getPreferredBoardSize()
          Returns the preferred board size.
 void paintBoard(java.awt.Graphics g, java.awt.Component component, int x, int y, int width, int height)
          Paints the board at the given location on the given Graphics scaled to the given size.
 

Method Detail

getPreferredBoardSize

java.awt.Dimension getPreferredBoardSize()
Returns the preferred board size. Should return a dimension that has no area if this BoardPainter has no preferred size.

paintBoard

void paintBoard(java.awt.Graphics g,
                java.awt.Component component,
                int x,
                int y,
                int width,
                int height)
Paints the board at the given location on the given Graphics scaled to the given size. The component argument may be null.
